Sincerely
Leonard H. Marks
Dr. G. Straschnov
1 rue de Varembe
Geneva, Switzerland
P. S. Incidentally, if none of the formal plans
outlined above materialize, we do intend to have
you as a dinner guest on the evening of October 22,
and invite some friends whom I know you would be
interested to meet.
